$meta.description: A `ctfEvent` object can be obtained by using [get_ctf](#GENERAL_GET_CTF). The `classID` used for this object is `"ctfEvent"`.

player_success.description: Checks if CTF event got completed successfully.

get_creator_name.description: The the name of the CTF event creator.

get_mail_content.description: Get mail content for CTF event.
